references.reason: This paper is foundational for differentially private deep learning, introducing the mechanism used in the current work.

references.paper_title: The algorithmic foundations of differential privacy
references.reason: This is the seminal work that establishes the theoretical foundations of differential privacy, providing the core concepts on which the current research is built.

references.paper_title: Differentially private learning with adaptive clipping
references.reason: This paper introduces a key technique (adaptive clipping) that addresses the limitations of standard DP mechanisms, significantly improving performance, which the current work expands upon.

references.paper_title: Automatic clipping: Differentially private deep learning made easier and stronger
references.reason: This very recent paper provides another state-of-the-art method to improve DP training which the current work is compared to and combined with.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models
references.reason: This paper describes a large language model whose training challenges the current work aims to address through improved differentially private optimization techniques.
